alert.note: Alert for Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 8:13PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Pima and north central Santa Cruz Counties through 900 PM MST... At 813 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Three Points, or 14 miles northwest of Sahuarita, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Marana, Green Valley, Tubac, Drexel Heights, Three Points, Avra Valley, Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, Tucson Estates, Saguaro National Park West, Kitt Peak, Valencia West, Picture Rocks, Amado, San Pedro, Queens Well, Santa Rosa Ranch, Pan Tak, Ryan AirField and Arivaca Junction. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 245 and 248. Interstate 19 between mile markers 24 and 38. Route 86 between mile markers 129 and 167. Route 286 between mile markers 10 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
